text: Ganjar Mukti Muhardiyana (born 12 June 1994) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Persiraja Banda Aceh, on loan from Arema. He previously played for PS Bengkulu, Persita Tangerang, Bali United F.C., PS TIRA, and PSIS Semarang. ==Career== ===PS Bengkulu=== Ganjar joined PS Bengkulu in Divisi Utama 2013 ===Persita Tangerang=== Ganjar joined Persita Tangerang, and made his debut in the 2014 Inter Island Cup.Daftar pemain yang masuk dalam skuat Inter Island Cup 2014 ===Bali United=== Move from Persita Tangerang and now he joined Bali United F.C. as a Defender.Ganjar Mukti Bali United ===PS TNI=== In 2016, he moved to PS TNI from Bali United with a reason to pursue his dream as Indonesian National Armed Forces.Dua pemain Bali United gabung PS TNI demi bela negara ===PSIS Semarang=== In September 2016, Ganjar joined PSIS Semarang.Ganjar dan Ivan resmi gabung PSIS He made his debut against Persekap Pasuruan which ended 3-1 for PSIS Semarang. Ganjar provide feedback led to goals who scored by Johan Yoga.PSIS kalahkan Persekap 3-1, Johan Yoga borong dua gol ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Bali United F.C. players Category:Living people Category:People from Tangerang Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Banten Category:Association football defenders
title: Ganjar Mukti
